本插件实现了TiddlySeq Theme主题的主体部分，包括样式，以及一些小组件。@@color:red;请搭配[[Vanilla主题|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla]]使用！@@

<$list filter="[<lang>!search[zh]]">

This plugin implements the main part of the TiddlySeq Theme theme, including styles, and some widgets. @@color:red;Please use it with [[Vanilla theme|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla]]!@@

</$list>
